notes: All attractions researched from official sources and travel guides. Prices in CNY unless noted. Some advance booking required. Weather may affect outdoor activities in February-March.

days.weather_consideration: February in Chongqing - cool and potentially foggy (10-15°C), dress in layers
days.jet_lag_note: Relaxed pace - limit to 2-3 attractions, prioritize nearby spots

attractions.name: 下浩里龙门浩老街 (Longmenhao Historical District)
attractions.address: 南岸区南滨路105号 (Nanbin Road No. 105, Nan'an District)
attractions.transportation: Metro Line 1 to Xiaoshizi → Transfer Line 6 to Shangxinjie Station Exit 2
attractions.best_time: Afternoon 14:00-17:00 (after luggage drop, natural light for photos)
attractions.notes: Free admission. Restored traditional Chongqing architecture with layered streets. Over 20 heritage sites including former consulates. Excellent for photography. Not crowded. INFJ-friendly authentic vibe.

attractions.name: 湖广会馆 (Huguang Guild Hall)
attractions.address: 渝中区东水门长滨路 (Yangtze riverside, Yuzhong District)
attractions.notes: Qing Dynasty guild hall complex. Optional cultural performances (¥68-118 extra, skip if tired from jet lag). Beautiful traditional architecture. Close to hotel area.

attractions.name: 熹玥盒子 (Xiyue Box)
attractions.notes: Trendy art space. Specific location and hours not confirmed in web search - recommend asking hotel concierge or checking locally. May be closed or relocated.

attractions.name: 魅力重庆无人机秀 (Glamorous Chongqing Drone Show)
attractions.opening_hours: Show starts at 20:30 (Feb 15 falls in Oct 1-Apr 30 schedule)
attractions.schedule: Every Saturday + major holidays (Feb 15 is Saturday during Spring Festival period - HIGH PROBABILITY)
attractions.best_viewing_spot: Nanbin Road area near Raffles - convenient and excellent view
attractions.best_time: Arrive by 20:00 to secure good viewing spot
attractions.notes: FREE. Guinness World Record holder (11,787 drones). Launches from Planning Exhibition Hall platform. Show visible from multiple spots along river. May cancel in heavy rain/strong wind. Expect 100,000+ spectators on holidays. Check '重庆发布' WeChat for confirmation day-of.

days.scheduling_notes: Morning: Rest from overnight flight. Afternoon: 2-3 attractions (Longmenhao → Huguang Guild Hall). Evening: Drone show at 20:30. Skip Xiyue Box if tired. Prioritize jet lag recovery.
days.alternative_plan: If too tired: Skip Huguang Guild Hall, just do Longmenhao walk + Drone show. Rest at hotel spa between activities.

days.location_change: Travel day - Chongqing to Bazhong by high-speed rail (~07:00 departure)
days.notes: Travel day + family time. Spring Festival Eve (除夕). No tourist activities scheduled.

days.weather_consideration: February in Bazhong - cold mornings (5-10°C), warm up by noon

attractions.name: 南龛坡/南龛山景区 (Nankan Slope)
attractions.priority: High - User specified (南龛坡 OR 望王山)
attractions.notes: FREE admission. Features Tang Dynasty stone grottoes on hillside. Locally known as 南龛坡. Light historical interest - focus on scenic views rather than deep history (per user preference). Good for morning walk and photos.

attractions.name: 望王山 (Wangwang Mountain)
attractions.notes: Alternative scenic spot if 南龛坡 is crowded or weather-dependent. Specific details not confirmed in search. Recommend 南龛坡 as primary choice due to confirmed information.

days.evening_activity: 晚上逛太古里 (Taikoo Li Chengdu) upon arrival - see Day 3 evening notes
days.scheduling_notes: Morning: 老五酱肉包子 breakfast → 南龛坡 visit (90 min) → Pack & family goodbye. Noon: 老七牛肉 lunch. Afternoon: High-speed rail to Chengdu (~13:00-14:00). Evening: Arrive Chengdu, explore Taikoo Li.

days.weather_consideration: Chengdu February - mild but often cloudy/smoggy, check air quality for panda base visit

attractions.name: 成都大熊猫繁育研究基地
attractions.name_english: Chengdu Research Base of Giant Panda Breeding
attractions.booking_note: MUST book online 14 days in advance with real-name registration. Daily limit 30,000 morning tickets. Platforms: WeChat Official Account, Meituan, Trip.com, Douyin
attractions.address: 外北熊猫大道1375号 (1375 Panda Avenue, North Suburb)
attractions.arrival_time: 09:00 SHARP - pandas most active during feeding (08:00-09:00)
attractions.best_time: Arrive exactly 09:00 to catch feeding activity
attractions.notes: ¥50 admission. Book NOW (14 days advance). Bring ID card for entry. Pandas most active 08:00-09:00 during feeding. Sightseeing vehicle available (¥30 extra, optional). Limit visit to 1 hour as requested. February is good season - cooler weather means pandas more active.

attractions.name: 锦里古街 (Jinli Ancient Street)
attractions.address: 武侯祠大街231号 (231 Wuhou Temple Street, near Wuhou Temple)
attractions.notes: FREE admission. Qing Dynasty-style buildings. Many local snacks, souvenir shops, bars. Adjacent to Wuhou Temple (skip temple interior per user preference for minimal deep history). Good for lunch options and light shopping before flight.

attractions.name: 成都太古里 (Taikoo Li Chengdu)
attractions.address: 锦江区中纱帽街8号 (Jinjiang District, near Chunxi Road)
attractions.best_time: Evening of Day 3 (Feb 17) upon arrival from Bazhong
attractions.notes: FREE entry. Open-air mall with boutiques, cafes, restaurants. Modern luxury shopping. Close to Daci Temple. INFJ-friendly trendy atmosphere. Visit evening of Day 3 after arriving from Bazhong.

days.evening_activity: Shanghai: 外滩 + 南京路 night view (see Day 4 evening notes)
days.scheduling_notes: CRITICAL TIMING: 09:00 Panda Base (book NOW!) → 11:30 Return to 锦里 for lunch/stroll → 13:30 Return home to pack → 14:35 Flight to Shanghai → Evening: 外滩 + 南京路 night walk

days.weather_consideration: Shanghai late February - cool & humid (8-12°C), possible rain - bring umbrella

attractions.name: 外滩 (The Bund)
attractions.best_time: Morning 10:00-11:30 or late afternoon 16:00-18:00 for golden hour photos
attractions.notes: FREE. Historic architecture along Huangpu River. View Pudong skyline. Walk from hotel (very close to Nanjing Road hotel). Best photos in morning or golden hour. Crowded on weekends.

attractions.name: 人民广场 (People's Square)
attractions.best_time: Walk through en route to other destinations
attractions.notes: FREE. Central Shanghai landmark. Walk-by only - don't allocate dedicated time. Adjacent to Shanghai Museum (skip per user preference for minimal museums). Use as transit point.

attractions.name: 浦东美术馆 (MAP - Museum of Art Pudong)
attractions.address: 浦东新区滨江大道2777号 (2777 Binjiang Ave, Pudong, near Oriental Pearl Tower)
attractions.notes: Modern art museum opened 2021. Located at foot of Oriental Pearl Tower. Ticket price varies by exhibition - check website museumofartpd.org.cn. OPTIONAL - only if genuinely interested in current exhibition. Hotline: 400-820-8771

attractions.name: 思南书局 (Sinan Books)
attractions.address: Multiple locations - main: French Concession area (Gaolan Lu 皋兰路)
attractions.notes: FREE entry. Poetry-themed bookstore in restored French garden house/former church. 20% English books curated by London Review Bookshop. Beautiful architecture. PERFECT for INFJ personality. Quiet, authentic, cultured atmosphere. May have multiple branches.

attractions.name: 上海外文书店 (Shanghai Foreign Language Bookstore)
attractions.address: 福州路390号 (390 Fuzhou Road) - main flagship
attractions.notes: FREE entry. 4 floors of English books - largest English selection in Shanghai. Fiction, nonfiction, textbooks, classics. More commercial than Sinan Books but comprehensive inventory. Visit if girlfriend wants wider English book selection.

attractions.name: POPMART旗舰店 (POPMART Flagship Store - Nanjing Road)
attractions.priority: High - INFJ/cute things per user requirement
attractions.address: 南京东路288号宏伊国际广场 (HKRI Taikoo Hui, 288 Nanjing East Road)
attractions.transportation: Metro Line 2 or 10 to Nanjing East Road Station, Exit 3
attractions.notes: FREE entry. 2-level flagship store. Exclusive limited editions. Perfect for girlfriend who loves 泡泡马特. VERY close to hotel (Nanjing Road area). May have crowds in evenings/weekends. Also location at Shimao Festival City.

attractions.name: 独立咖啡馆/Indie Cafes
attractions.notes: Budget ~¥50-80 per person for coffee+pastry. Research specific cafes day-of based on location routing. French Concession area has many INFJ-friendly intimate cafes. Combine with bookstore visits.

days.scheduling_notes: Morning: 外滩 walk (10:00-11:30) → Lunch. Afternoon: Sinan Books (15:00) + indie cafe nearby → Optional 浦东美术馆 if energy permits. Evening: POPMART flagship store (18:00-19:30) → Dinner. Flexible schedule for INFJ girlfriend's preferences.
days.infj_optimization: Prioritize: Sinan Books (quiet, authentic) + POPMART (cute things) + 1-2 indie cafes. Skip crowded tourist spots. Quality over quantity.

days.weather_consideration: Check weather forecast - indoor/outdoor mix at Disney

attractions.name: 上海迪士尼乐园 (Shanghai Disneyland)
attractions.booking_note: MUST book online 2-4 weeks advance. Tickets NOT sold at gate. Peak day likely (weekend during Spring Festival period)
attractions.address: 浦东新区川沙镇黄赵路310号 (Pudong District, Chuansha)
attractions.ticket_pricing: Tiered pricing: Regular ¥475 / Peak ¥599 / Holiday ¥719-799. Feb 20 likely PEAK or HOLIDAY tier (Saturday + Spring Festival week)
attractions.best_time: Arrive at opening (rope drop) for shortest lines
attractions.notes: BOOK NOW - sells out weeks in advance for weekends/holidays. Estimate ¥599 peak pricing (Saturday + Spring Festival). Children <1m free, 1-1.4m child ticket. Bring snacks to save money. Download Shanghai Disney app for wait times. Popular attractions: TRON, Soaring, Pirates. FastPass unavailable - arrive early for priority rides.

days.cost_note: ¥1198 for 2 adults (¥599 x 2) - peak day pricing estimate
days.scheduling_notes: FULL DAY at Disney. Leave hotel 08:00 → Arrive park by opening → Full day → Return evening. Pre-book tickets NOW. Budget ¥200-300 additional for meals inside park.
days.booking_urgency: HIGH - Book Disney tickets immediately (2-4 weeks advance required, sells out fast for Spring Festival dates)

days.weather_consideration: Last day in Shanghai - indoor shopping/dining preferred if rainy

attractions.name: Shopping - Fashion Items
shopping_areas: 南京路步行街 (Nanjing Road) - close to hotel
attractions.notes: Budget estimate ¥500 per person for fashion items. Focus on Chinese brands not available in Europe (JNBY, Exception, etc.). Nanjing Road most convenient from hotel. K11 has INFJ-friendly art + retail mix.

attractions.name: Cute Shops & Trendy Spots
attractions.notes: Budget ¥200-300 for cute items/souvenirs. POPMART especially important for girlfriend. Xintiandi area has many INFJ-friendly boutique shops.

attractions.name: Michelin Restaurant Experience
options: 人和馆 (Renhe Guan) - 本帮菜 Michelin recommended
ajiya - 日式烤肉 Japanese BBQ
attractions.booking_note: MUST reserve 1-2 weeks advance for weekend. Call or use Dianping/Meituan
attractions.notes: Budget ¥800-1200 for two people (Michelin level). Book NOW for weekend dinner. 人和馆 for authentic Shanghai cuisine (本帮菜). ajiya for high-end Japanese BBQ. Confirm reservations 1 day prior.

days.cost_breakdown: Shopping ¥700 + Michelin dinner ¥1600 for two people
days.scheduling_notes: Relaxed last day in Shanghai. Morning/afternoon: Fashion shopping + cute shops (flexible 3-4 hours). Evening: Michelin restaurant (book NOW). Pack for Beijing flight tomorrow morning.
days.booking_urgency: MEDIUM - Book Michelin restaurant this week (weekend dinner slot)

fixed_activities: Evening: 舞剧《只此青绿》 dance performance (already booked)
days.notes: Travel + admin day. No tourist attractions. Performance in evening.
Orientation + moving day. No tourist activities. Focus on settling in.

days.weather_consideration: Beijing late February - cold & dry (0-5°C daytime), possible wind, dress warmly

attractions.name: 清华大学校园游 (Tsinghua University Campus Tour)
attractions.priority: CRITICAL - Building comfort zone per user
attractions.booking_note: MUST book 7 days advance via 'Visit Tsinghua' WeChat mini-program. Face recognition entry at West Gate with ID card. International visitors: email bwb@mail.tsinghua.edu.cn 1-7 days prior
highlights: 荷塘月色 (Lotus Pond - beautiful but winter)
attractions.notes: FREE admission. Book NOW via WeChat (7 days advance). Girlfriend's future school - important for comfort building. Campus tours available weekends/holidays. Feb 24 is Monday - VERIFY if open (may be restricted to weekends only). If closed Monday, reschedule to Day 15/16 (weekend Mar 1-2). Winter campus may be cold but less crowded.

attractions.name: 清华周边餐厅 (Tsinghua Area Restaurants)
areas: 五道口 (Wudaokou) - student area, diverse food
清华东门 (Tsinghua East Gate) - campus food street
attractions.notes: Budget ¥150 for meal. Explore multiple restaurants for future reference. Wudaokou has Korean, Western, Chinese options. East Gate has cheap student eats. Map out girlfriend's future regular spots.

attractions.name: 清华周边咖啡馆 (Cafes near Tsinghua)
attractions.notes: Budget ¥60 for coffee. Find INFJ-friendly quiet cafes girlfriend can use for study. Scout 2-3 options. Wudaokou has international cafe culture.

attractions.name: 舞蹈工作室调研 (Dance Studio Research)
attractions.notes: FREE (research only). Scout dance studios for girlfriend. Note locations, class schedules, pricing. Check Dianping/Meituan for reviews. May visit in person or research online.

days.scheduling_notes: CRITICAL: Verify Tsinghua campus open on Monday Feb 24 - may be weekends only. If closed, reschedule to weekend. Full day: Tsinghua campus tour (10:00-13:00) → Lunch at Tsinghua area restaurant → Cafe exploration → Dance studio research (walk-bys). Map out girlfriend's future routine spots.
days.booking_urgency: HIGH - Book Tsinghua visit NOW via WeChat (7 days advance). Check Monday availability.
days.comfort_zone_focus: Primary goal: Familiarize girlfriend with future school area. Reduce anxiety about new environment. Find her regular spots (cafes, restaurants, dance).

attractions.name: Solo Exploration or Rest
options: Visit 798 Art District solo (research for Day 14 together)
Explore hutongs (南锣鼓巷 or other areas)
Rest day / catch up on work
attractions.notes: Girlfriend at school. Low-key day. Budget ¥100 if going out. Can scout locations for future couple visits.

days.notes: Optional activities only. Girlfriend unavailable (school day). Rest or light solo exploration.

attractions.name: Solo Exploration or Rest
options: Visit Temple of Heaven solo (girlfriend will visit with classmates later - you skip)
attractions.notes: Girlfriend at school. Low-key day. DO NOT visit 天坛/颐和园/长城 (girlfriend doing with classmates later).

days.notes: Optional activities only. Girlfriend unavailable (school day). Rest or light solo exploration.

days.weather_consideration: Beijing late Feb - bundle up for outdoor 故宫 visit

attractions.name: 故宫博物院 (The Forbidden City)
attractions.booking_note: MUST book online 7 days advance with real-name registration. NO same-day tickets. Closed Mondays. Feb 27 is Friday - OPEN
attractions.address: 东城区景山前街4号 (Dongcheng District)
attractions.entrance: Enter from south (Tiananmen) → Exit north (Shenwu Gate 神武门)
attractions.optional_tickets: Treasure Gallery ¥10, Clock Gallery ¥10 (SKIP per user - minimal deep history interest)
attractions.best_time: Arrive 09:00-09:30 (after morning rush, before midday crowds)
attractions.notes: ¥40 per person (winter pricing). BOOK NOW ticket.dpm.org.cn (7 days advance, real-name, ID required). Closed Mondays. Huge complex - plan 3-4 hours. Focus on main axis architecture rather than detailed exhibits (per user preference for light historical interest). Winter = fewer crowds but cold. Bring warm clothes. Exit to Jingshan Park (optional ¥2 for panoramic view).

attractions.name: 景山公园 (Jingshan Park)
attractions.best_time: Immediately after 故宫 (north exit leads directly here)
attractions.notes: ¥2 entrance. Directly behind 故宫 north exit. Climb to pavilion for best panoramic view of Forbidden City rooftops. Worth it for photos. Takes 20-30 minutes. OPTIONAL - skip if tired from 故宫 walk.

attractions.name: 南锣鼓巷 (Nanluoguxiang)
attractions.transportation: Metro Line 6 or 8 to Nanluoguxiang Station Exit E
attractions.notes: FREE admission. 800m historic hutong with souvenir shops, snacks, cafes, bars. Touristy but photogenic. OPTIONAL - only if energy permits after 故宫. Shops close ~22:00. May be crowded on weekend.

attractions.name: 室内情侣摄影 (Indoor Couple Photography)
attractions.booking_note: Book 1-2 weeks advance. Avoid Tue/Wed/Thu (girlfriend school). Weekend slots fill fast.
attractions.best_time: Afternoon 14:00-16:00 (if scheduled instead of morning 故宫)
attractions.notes: Budget ¥800-1500 for professional indoor couple shoot. Research studios on Dianping/Meituan. Popular Beijing studios in 798, Sanlitun areas. Book for Day 13, 14, 15, 16, or 20 (avoid girlfriend's school days Tue/Wed/Thu).

days.cost_breakdown: 故宫 ¥80 (2 people) + 景山 ¥4 (if visited) - excludes optional photography session
days.scheduling_notes: Morning/Full Day: 故宫 (book NOW, 09:00 arrival, 3-4 hours) → Optional 景山 panoramic view → Optional 南锣鼓巷 if energy permits. If couple photography booked, adjust schedule accordingly.
days.booking_urgency: HIGH - Book 故宫 tickets NOW (7 days advance required, real-name). If photography desired, book studio this week.
days.user_preference_note: Focus on 故宫 architecture and photo ops rather than deep historical exhibits. Light historical interest only.

days.weather_consideration: Indoor-focused day (art, bookstores, cafes) - weather flexible

attractions.name: 798艺术区 (798 Art District)
attractions.address: 朝阳区酒仙桥路4号 (Chaoyang District, Jiuxianqiao Road)
attractions.transportation: Subway Line 14 to Jiangtai Station, Exit A + 15 min walk or taxi
galleries: UCCA (Ullens Center) - rotating exhibitions, may charge entry
attractions.notes: FREE district entry. Over 500 galleries, cafes, bookstores, boutiques. Former factory complex converted to art zone. Most galleries FREE, some charge ¥20-50 for special exhibitions. INFJ-friendly: quiet, cultured, authentic art scene. Also has trendy cafes and indie bookstores (see below). Allow 3 hours to explore. Skip overly commercial areas, focus on smaller galleries.

attractions.name: 798艺术区书店 (Bookstores in 798)
recommendations: Mix of Chinese and English art books
attractions.notes: FREE entry to bookstores. 798 has several indie bookshops focusing on art, design, photography. English selection varies - more art/visual books than literary. Combine bookstore browsing with gallery hopping.

attractions.name: 798咖啡馆 (Trendy Cafes in 798)
attractions.notes: Budget ¥60-80 per person. 798 famous for artistic cafe culture. INFJ-friendly quiet spaces with design focus. Perfect for girlfriend's aesthetic interests. Combine with bookstore and gallery browsing.

attractions.name: 北京独立书店 (Beijing Indie Bookstores)
attractions.name_english: Beijing Independent Bookstores with English Books
alternatives: The Bookworm (Sanlitun) - English bookstore/cafe, possibly closed
attractions.notes: FREE entry. Research current status - Beijing indie bookstores change frequently. 798 bookstores may be sufficient. Only add if girlfriend specifically wants more English literary (vs. art) books.

attractions.name: 时尚购物 (Fashion Shopping)
areas: 三里屯太古里 (Sanlitun Taikoo Li) - trendy fashion
侨福芳草地 (Parkview Green) - eco-luxury mall
国贸商城 (China World Mall) - high-end
attractions.notes: Budget ¥400 for fashion items. Sanlitun closest to 798 (15 min taxi). Focus on Chinese designer brands. More shopping if Day 7 Shanghai was insufficient.

attractions.name: 室内情侣摄影 (Indoor Couple Photography)
attractions.notes: See Day 13 notes. Book if desired. 798 area has many photo studios.

days.cost_breakdown: 798 entry FREE + Cafe ¥120 (2 people) + Fashion shopping ¥400 estimate
days.scheduling_notes: Full day INFJ-focused: 798 Art District (10:00-15:00) including galleries, bookstores, cafe → Sanlitun fashion shopping (17:00-20:00) → Dinner in Sanlitun. Highly aligned with girlfriend's interests (art, books, cafes, cute/trendy). Alternative: If couple photography booked, do photos 14:00-16:00, abbreviated 798 visit morning only.
days.infj_optimization: PERFECT day for girlfriend: Art (798 galleries) + Books (indie bookstores) + Cafes (trendy spots) + Fashion. Prioritize quality/unique over touristy.

days.weather_consideration: Early March Beijing - slightly warmer (3-8°C) but still cold, possible wind

attractions.name: 清华周边深度探索 (Deep Tsinghua Area Exploration)
attractions.priority: Medium - Free day activity per user
areas: 清华东门周边 (East Gate area)
中关村科技区 (Zhongguancun tech district)
北京大学周边 (PKU area nearby)
attractions.notes: Budget ¥200 for meals/cafes. Revisit Tsinghua area from Day 10 with more depth. Try different restaurants, cafes girlfriend might frequent. Walk campus if re-visitable. Explore student life areas. Build familiarity and comfort.

attractions.name: 室内情侣摄影 (Indoor Couple Photography)
attractions.notes: See Day 13 notes. Good day for photo session (weekend, girlfriend available). Book if desired.

days.notes: Free day - flexible schedule. Revisit Tsinghua area OR do couple photography OR rest day. Low pressure. Building comfort zone focus.

attractions.name: Building Comfort Zone Activities
options: Visit local markets and grocery stores
Visit museums if interested (skip per user preference)
attractions.notes: Budget ¥150 if going out. Focus on practical comfort: grocery shopping, finding regular spots, building daily life routine. Low-key day.

days.notes: Free day - rest or light activities. Building comfort zone in rental neighborhood.

attractions.name: Solo Activities
options: Visit 国家博物馆 (National Museum) if interested (FREE)
attractions.notes: Girlfriend at school. Low-key solo day. National Museum is FREE and near Tiananmen if interested (avoid deep exhibits, focus on highlights).

days.notes: Optional solo activities. Girlfriend unavailable (school day).

attractions.name: Solo Activities
attractions.notes: Girlfriend at school. Low-key solo day.

days.notes: Optional solo activities. Girlfriend unavailable (school day).

attractions.name: Solo Activities
attractions.notes: Girlfriend at school. Low-key solo day.

days.notes: Optional solo activities. Girlfriend unavailable (school day).

days.weather_consideration: Early March - still cold for day trips (bundle up)

attractions.name: 天津一日游 (Tianjin Day Trip)
attractions.transportation: High-speed rail Beijing → Tianjin (30 min, ¥55 one-way)
highlights: 五大道 (Five Great Avenues) - European architecture
意大利风情街 (Italian Style Street)
天津之眼 (Tianjin Eye Ferris Wheel)
海河夜景 (Haihe River night view)
attractions.notes: Budget ¥200 per person (¥110 train + ¥50 local transport + ¥40 meals). OPTIONAL - only if both interested in day trip. Tianjin has unique European architecture and local food culture. 30-minute high-speed rail from Beijing. Good break from Beijing routine. Skip if prefer rest day.

attractions.name: Free Day Together in Beijing
options: Visit parks (Temple of Heaven if girlfriend changed mind, but likely still skip)
attractions.notes: Budget ¥200 if staying in Beijing. Relaxed day together. No pressure to sightsee.

days.notes: Free day together - Tianjin day trip optional (skip if not interested). Otherwise relaxed Beijing day. Girlfriend available (Friday).

attractions.name: Final Comfort Zone Activities
activities: Visit any missed spots near apartment
attractions.notes: Budget ¥100 for final meals/activities. Mostly packing day. Light activities for closure. Say goodbye to favorite spots. Prepare for departure.

days.notes: Final day - focus on packing and departure prep. Light activities only. Closure on comfort zone building.

booking_urgencies: IMMEDIATE: Chengdu Panda Base (14 days advance) - Day 4
IMMEDIATE: Shanghai Disneyland (2-4 weeks advance) - Day 6
THIS WEEK: Tsinghua campus tour (7 days advance) - Day 10, verify Monday availability
THIS WEEK: 故宫 Forbidden City (7 days advance) - Day 13
THIS WEEK: Shanghai Michelin restaurant (weekend dinner) - Day 7
OPTIONAL: Indoor couple photography (1-2 weeks) - Days 13/14/15
infj_highlights: Day 1: 下浩里龙门浩 (authentic, not touristy)
Day 5: Sinan Books + POPMART + indie cafes (quiet, cultured, cute)
Day 14: 798 Art District (art + books + trendy cafes - PERFECT for INFJ)
summary.weather_notes: February: Cold in all cities (0-15°C). March: Slightly warmer (3-10°C). Dress in layers. Beijing coldest and driest. Shanghai humid. Chongqing foggy.

important_notes: ALL PRICES IN CNY (Chinese Yuan). Conversion rate ~7.8 CNY = 1 EUR as of user context.
Total attraction costs ¥4815 (~€617) within €1000 total budget (excluding meals, local transport).
BOOK IMMEDIATELY: Panda Base (Day 4), Shanghai Disney (Day 6), Tsinghua (Day 10), 故宫 (Day 13).
Weather: February-March is COLD. Dress warmly for all outdoor activities.
INFJ optimization: Prioritized unique, authentic, quiet spots over touristy crowds. Quality over quantity.
Minimal deep historical explanations per user preference - light cultural interest only.
Girlfriend unavailable every Tue/Wed/Thu after Feb 23 - plan solo or rest activities those days.
Days 11, 12, 17, 18, 19 are solo days (girlfriend at school) - low-key activities only.
Couple photography optional - book for days girlfriend available (avoid Tue/Wed/Thu).
Tianjin day trip (Day 20) completely optional - skip if prefer rest.
Research drone show status day-of (Feb 15) via '重庆发布' WeChat - weather dependent.
